--- In gladiator@y..., "Sean" <Darklord217@h...> wrote:
> I've been in this group for a very long time, since when Gladiator 
> was nearing its end of popularity.

Well, I am trying to do something to revive interest: holding the 1st 
gladiator tournament.  Yes, the tournament is working on that.
 
> Even though its been a few years, is Gladiator: Beyond Freedom 
truely 
> scrapped???

I've been around a year, and the existance of G:BF is almost to the 
point of being a rumor.  Aside from claims of 2-3 people, no person 
has seen G:BF.
